title: Lakers vs. Nets, NFL Championship Preview, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Lakers vs. Nets, NFL Championship Preview, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Matt and Stak bring the heat on the latest edition of WHAT'S BURNIN, as they preview a week of big NBA matchups, including Lakers vs. Nets. Plus, they recap maybe the wildest weekend in NFL history and preview the upcoming conference championship games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
